title: A-9 Vigilance Interceptor
wikitext:
[[File:A-9-Vigilance-Interceptor1.jpg|thumb|500px]] [[File:A-9-Vigilance-Interceptor2.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''Craft''': Kuat Drive Yards A-9 Vigilance Interceptor
